column3: I really loved all of the food. The service was good
column4: however I did have to ask multiple times for our drink orders that seemed to have been forgotten
column5: as well as the ramen that was ordered. In the end
column6: we ended up cancelling the ramen because we finished dinner and dessert
column7: so I'm quite certain the item was missed. Regardless
column8: I will definitely be back here for the food.
